de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database

Class QueryUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.QueryUtil

  • public final class QueryUtil
extends Object
    Static class with utilities related to querying a database.
    Since:
    0.4.0
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

      • getKNNQuery

        public static <O> KNNQuery<O> getKNNQuery(Database database,
                          DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                          Object... hints)
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance function. An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Integer: maximum value for k needed
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        database - Database
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getKNNQuery

        public static <O> KNNQuery<O> getKNNQuery(Relation<O> relation,
                          DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                          Object... hints)
        Get a KNN query object for the given distance function. An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Integer: maximum value for k needed
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        relation - Relation used
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getRangeQuery

        public static <O> RangeQuery<O> getRangeQuery(Database database,
                              DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                              Object... hints)
        Get a range query object for the given distance function for radius-based neighbor search. (Range queries in ELKI refers to radius-based ranges, not rectangular query windows.) An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Range: maximum range requested
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        database - Database
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getRangeQuery

        public static <O> RangeQuery<O> getRangeQuery(Relation<O> relation,
                              DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                              Object... hints)
        Get a range query object for the given distance function for radius-based neighbor search. (Range queries in ELKI refers to radius-based ranges, not rectangular query windows.) An index is used when possible, but it may fall back to a linear scan. Hints include:
        • Range: maximum range requested
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        relation - Relation used
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        KNN Query object

      • getRKNNQuery

        public static <O> RKNNQuery<O> getRKNNQuery(Relation<O> relation,
                            DistanceFunction<? super O> distanceFunction,
                            Object... hints)
        Get a rKNN query object for the given distance function. When possible, this will use an index, but it may default to an expensive linear scan. Hints include:
        • Integer: maximum value for k needed
        • DatabaseQuery.HINT_BULK bulk query needed
        Type Parameters:
        O - Object type
        Parameters:
        relation - Relation used
        distanceFunction - Distance function
        hints - Optimizer hints
        Returns:
        RKNN Query object

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        distanceQuery - distance query
        Returns:
        KNN query
